code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./SearchBar.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SearchBar=_ref=>{let{onSearch}=_ref;const[input,setInput]=useState('');const[dateRange,setDateRange]=useState('last_3_days');const[reputable,setReputable]=useState(false);const handleSearch=()=>{if(input.trim()){onSearch(input,dateRange,reputable);}};const handleKeyPress=event=>{if(event.key==='Enter'){handleSearch();}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"search-bar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Enter a news topic...",value:input,onChange:e=>setInput(e.target.value),onKeyPress:handleKeyPress,className:"search-input"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleSearch,className:"search-button",children:"Search"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{value:dateRange,onChange:e=>setDateRange(e.target.value),className:"date-range-select",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"last_3_days",children:"Last 3 days"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"last_week",children:"Last week"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"last_month",children:"Last month"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"checkbox",checked:reputable,onChange:e=>setReputable(e.target.checked)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"reputable-sources-tag",children:"Limit to reputable sources"})]})]});};export default SearchBar;
